Key Match Events: Egypt fell behind 1-0 just minutes after losing Mohamed Salah to an injury
Mohamed Kudus scored a stunning opener for Ghana
Omar Marmoush equalized for Egypt after a defensive error
Kudus doubled his tally to give Ghana a 2-1 lead
Mostafa Mohamed scored an unexpected goal to bring Egypt level again
Iddrisu Baba missed a crucial chance in stoppage time
Post-Match Reflections: Mohamed Salah's injury was a significant blow for Egypt
Both teams remain winless after two matches in the tournament
The match ended in a draw, leaving both teams on two points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Player ratings were provided for both teams
Mohamed Kudus was named Player of the Match
The match had a chaotic second half with three goals in quick succession
